Commentary.ab: VrS27.48a āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi iδa ...] sec cod.; Geldner, Kellens (Kellens, 2010: p. 100) āat̰ iδa .... āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi might be a transmission error, that entered early in the recitation and in all manuscripts. Cf. Y27.1 aētat̰ dim (vid. in Parallels).
